serviceFour.underHeading: Challenges are just opportunities in disguise.

steps.heading: 01. Discussion
steps.text: We meet customers in set place to discuss the details about needs and demands before proposing a plan.

steps.heading: 02. Concepts & Initiatives
steps.text: Our experts come up with all kinds of ideas and initiatives for delivering the best solutions for IT services chosen.

steps.heading: 03. Testing & Trying
steps.text: After agreeing on the ideas and plans, we will conduct as scheduled and give comments on the results & adaptations.

steps.heading: 04. Execute & install
steps.text: Once the final plan is approved, everything will be conducted according to the agreed contract.

services.heading: Comprehensive Drug Testing
services.desc: ARIA provides extensive testing for pain management, natural/semi-synthetic/synthetic opioids & opiates, antipsychotics, illicits (like MDMA, PCP, Ketamine & THC) and upon request designer drugs (like synthetic cannabinoids, synthetic cathinones, etc).

services.heading: Proven Test Accuracy
services.desc: ARIA Diagnostics combines Presumptive Immunoassay testing with Definitive LC-MS/MS testing to ensure the most accurate analysis possible.

services.heading: Specimen Collectors
services.desc: ARIA can provide specimen collectors for observed and unobserved collection and courier services to help you accommodate the needs of our clients.

services.heading: Specialized Lab Requests
services.desc: ARIA offers assistance in developing compliance and testing protocol for many applications including pain management, adherence monitoring, rehab abstinence and workplace and student drug testing.

services.heading: Web-based Online Portal
services.desc: Paperless reports can be delivered conveniently and securely to the client. Sample analysis results are delivered in a comprehensive and easy-to-interpret report that highlights positive and inconsistent results.

services.heading: Client Service Specialist
services.desc: Our greatest asset is our staff. Providing fast, accurate, and secure results requires highly qualified, professional lab personnel.

services.heading: About IgG Antibodies
services.desc: The SARS-COV2- IMMUNOASSAY (IgG) can provide a broader picture of the SARS-CoV-2 virus such that if someone has been previously infected with the virus, it can show up in the body long after the initial infection. This test is designed by trusted and leading Abbott scientists and manufactured in volumes required to support the urgent needs of ongoing patient care.

services.heading: Returning To Work Safely
services.desc: The CDC recently released a Return to Work Criteria for HCPs with confirmed COVID-19, or suspected COVID-19. Decisions to return to work for HCP with confirmed OR suspected COVID-19 should be made in the context of local circumstances. Options include a symptom-based, or time-based strategy and most recently, a test-based strategy.

services.heading: How To Get Tested
services.desc: A sample of your blood is taken and loaded into a special instrument that detects whether IgG antibodies are present in the blood sample. This instrument can provide up to 6,000 tests per day. The Results are provided to the designated individual within 48 to 72 hours.
